summary: This mod takes effects that were already in the game but not used for player usable spells, and creates new spells that utilise these effects.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Red][size=3]Name          : [/size][/color]SoulLimit\'s Spell Pack
[color=Red][size=3]Version       : [/size][/color]1.0
[color=Red][size=3]Date          : [/size][/color]19/09/12
[color=Red][size=3]Category      : [/size][/color]Magic & Spells
[color=Red][size=3]Author(s)     : [/size][/color]SoulLimit
[Color=Red][size=3]Requirements :[/size][/color]Dawnguard
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
If you like this mod don\'t forget to Endorse and Vote.
[color=Red]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=Red][size=4]Description:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------[/color]
This mod takes effects that were already in the game but not used for player usable spells, and creates new spells that utilise these effects.

[color=Red][size=4]Detail:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------[/color]
This mod currently adds in 9 new spells to the game, that are of differing power, effect, and ability. They have been added in (hopefully correctly) to the correct leveled lists so they should be able to be brought from spell merchants.

The spells are:

Channel Energy I, II and III - these are restoration spells that hurt your enemies, but heal your allies. Restoration rank 25, 50 and 75 respectivly.

Force Push - A novice rank alteration spell mainly for fun, will send an actor flying away from you, similiar to unrelenting force, but only affects the targeted actor, will also hurt them slightly.

Freeze Ray - Apprentice level Destruction spell that will freeze your oponents solid for a short time and also hurt them.

Steam Blast - An Apprentice level destruction spell that scolds your foes with burning hot steam.

Toxic Sludge - An Apprentice level destruction spell that covers your foes in a toxic sludge, hurting an poisoning them.

Mages Gamble - A novice level destruction spell (but useful at all stages) that takes 10% of your health per second, and deals 3 times that amount to your enemies. (please note that even God Mode won\'t prevent health and hence death being taken).

Teleport - Whiterun: An adept level alteration spell that teleports the caster directly to Farengar\'s room in Dragonsreach. (This spell is only able to be brought from Farengar).


[color=Red][size=4]Location:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]----------------------[/color]
Spells can be found at their respective merchats (not sure of all merchants, but any merchant that sells the level of spell they are at, will likely sell these spells as well).

[color=Red][size=4]---Installation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Installation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
To install this mod via a manual installation you must Extract the contents of the archive and then place the contents in your Skyrim/Data folder.


[color=Red][size=4]---Uninstallation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]----------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Uninstallation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-----------------------------------[/color]
To uninstall this mod via a Manual Uninstallation you must delete the .esp from your Skyrim/Data folder, then delete all the included Scripts

[color=Red][size=4]Incompatabilities:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------------[/color]
Should not conflict with any other mods

[color=Red][size=4]Tools Used:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]------------------------[/color]
[url=http://newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=40278]Pyr√≤s: GuideLines[/url]
Creation Kit, Available on Steam

[color=Red][size=4]Future Plans:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------[/color]
Future plans include more spells, a few new shouts and powers.

[color=Red][size=4]Legal and licensing:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
First ask for my permission.
author: SoulLimit
